__TOC__

'''ThinkPad'''''(n)''''':''' A long running line of laptops introduced by IBM and now manufactured by Levono.  They are characterised by three button TrackPoint nipple mice and hard wearing matt black finishes.  Some were supplied pre-installed with GNU/Linux and most feature well supported hardware.

There is much useful information at <nowiki>[[http://www.thinkwiki.org/wiki/ThinkWiki|ThinkWiki]]</nowiki>.
